name: HANABIRA: WHEN THE PETALS FADE AWAY
name_original: HANABIRA: WHEN THE PETALS FADE AWAY
description:
ATTENTION: THE GAME CONTAINS THEMES OF DEPRESSION, SELF-HARM, SUICIDE, DISTURBING IMAGES! IT IS NOT RECOMMENDED FOR PEOPLE WITH MENTAL PROBLEMS TO PLAY.

People say that somewhere far away there is a separate world where there is no place for suffering, but not a single living soul has yet confirmed this. A little girl named Sharlett faced unpleasant events and ran away from her family's house in despair, but she could not have guessed that she would fall into that separate reality about which so much is being said. The child will have to find out if this world is really so pure. Isn't she afraid to face the bitter truth? Is she ready to face the Rulers of this world? How scary is the darkness hiding behind the light of this universe?

INSPIRED BY HELLO CHARLOTTE BY ETHERANE
